name: Tsukuyomi
description:
Pilot TSUKUYOMI in a rigorous space exploration. Maintain to your ship, navigate the unknown depths of space on your mission to find the legendary shining star - AMATERASU.

The game was developed for the Game Jam A Game by its Cover. The cover used was designed by the Graphic Designer William Hackworth  (@willhackworth)

TSUKUYOMI is a game made in a month in PICO 8 by Ivan Aco . Music by Gruber.

Thanks for playing, that means a lot!
